official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that funding under the Older Americans Act of 1965 for fiscal years 1983 and 1984 should be restored to the full amount of funding authorized by the Older Americans Act Amendments of 1981.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that funding under the Older Americans Act of 1965 for FY 1983 and 1984 should be restored to the full amount of funding authorized by the Older Americans Act Amendments of 1981.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that funding under the Older Americans Act of 1965 for fiscal years 1983 and 1984 should be restored to the full amount of funding authorized by the Older Americans Act Amendments of 1981.
